items.title: Intelligent Document Processing
items.content_html:
Welcome to the collaborative guide on Intelligent Document Processing. 
This resource centralizes technologies, vendors, capabilities, and advanced research in the field. Contribute to expanding this knowledge base.
Edit or add details about events, vendors, research, or open-source projects.

items.title: IDP Software Capabilities
items.content_html: This section provides detailed information about various capabilities commonly found in Intelligent Document Processing (IDP) software solutions.

items.title: Advanced AI Capabilities
items.content_html: Note: This content is a first draft and needs revision by a human expert in advanced AI for document processing.

items.title: Document Specific Tasks
items.content_html: Note: This content is a first draft and needs revision by a human expert in document-specific processing tasks.

items.title: Document Understanding
items.content_html: Note: This content is a first draft and needs revision by a human expert in document understanding.

items.title: Data Extraction
items.content_html: Data extraction is the process of retrieving structured information from documents, turning unstructured or semi-structured content into organized, usable data.

items.title: Integration and Workflow
items.content_html: Note: This content is a first draft and needs revision by a human expert in document processing integration and workflow.

items.content_html: Note: This content is a first draft and needs revision by a human expert in document layout analysis.

items.title: Natural Language Processing
items.content_html: Note: This content is a first draft and needs revision by a human expert in document-focused natural language processing.

items.title: Optical Character Recognition (OCR)
items.content_html: Optical Character Recognition (OCR) is the technology that converts different types of documents, such as scanned paper documents, PDF files, or images, into editable and searchable data.

items.title: Contribution Guide
items.content_html:
Thank you for your interest in contributing to the IDP Software documentation! This guide will
help you understand how to add content, structure your contributions, and submit them for review.

items.title: Events
items.content_html: A list of events related to Intelligent Document Processing (IDP), AI in document workflows, and broader document processing technologies.
